docs.lead_paragraph: WOMEN make good soldiers? Why not? Women are a great deal more combative than men.

headline.main: WHEN WOMEN FIGHT; Dr. Graeme M. Hammond Discusses "The Female of the Species," Her Warlike Qualities and Limitations When Women Fight--Doctor Says They Like War
